log.not_windows: Not running on Windows; CPU affinity changes are skipped.
log.not_enough_cores: Only {{cores}} logical CPU detected; skipping affinity changes.
log.too_many_cores: This system has {{cores}} logical CPUs. The affinity mask here covers only the first {{usable}} logical CPUs.
log.invalid_config: Invalid configuration. Affinity was not applied.
log.unknown_mode: Unknown Mode value in config. Use: ExcludeCpu0, AllCores, or CustomMask.
log.custommask_parse_fail: CustomMask couldn't be parsed. Use decimal (e.g. 15) or hex (e.g. 0xF).
log.mask_zero: Affinity mask resulted in 0 selected CPUs. Nothing was applied.
log.applied_focused: Game focused: applied CPU affinity. Mode={{mode}}, Mask={{mask}}, DetectedCores={{cores}}.
log.restored_unfocused: Game unfocused: restored original CPU affinity. Mask={{mask}}.
gmcm.section.title: CPU Affinity
gmcm.section.tooltip: Control which CPU cores Stardew Valley can use (Windows only). Default matches the Task Manager fix: exclude CPU 0.
gmcm.enabled.tooltip: If disabled, the mod won't change CPU affinity.
gmcm.restoreOnUnfocus.tooltip: If enabled, when the game loses focus the mod restores the original affinity, and re-applies your settings when refocused.
gmcm.mode.tooltip: Choose how the CPU affinity mask is set while the game is focused.
gmcm.custommask.tooltip: Used only in CustomMask mode. Enter decimal (15) or hex (0xF).
gmcm.logInfo.tooltip: If enabled, the mod logs when affinity is applied/restored.
